# uteals

An R package that provides common decorators, transformators, and
utility functions to enhance the [teal
package](https://cran.r-project.org/package=teal) ecosystem.

## Installation

``` r
# Install from GitHub
devtools::install_github("phuse-org/uteals")
```

## Development Status

This package is currently under development. Please see references and
vignettes for latest available features.

## Current Features

### Decorators

- **[`ggplot_decorator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/ggplot_decorator.md)** -
  Enhances teal modules with ggplot2 functionality
- **[`patchwork_plot_decorator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/patchwork_plot_decorator.md)** -
  Combines multiple plots using patchwork

### Transformators

- **[`merge_levels_transformator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/merge_levels_transformator.md)** -
  Merges factor levels in datasets
- **[`or_filtering_transformator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/or_filtering_transformator.md)** -
  Implements OR-based filtering logic

### Access Management

- **[`extract_modules_to_yaml()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/extract_modules_to_yaml.md)** -
  Extracts module structure to YAML configuration
- **[`keep_by_label()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/keep_by_label.md)** -
  Filters modules by label patterns
- **[`remove_by_label()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/remove_by_label.md)** -
  Removes modules by label patterns

## Vignettes

- [Module Access Management with
  rAccess](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/articles/module-access-management.md)

## About

The `uteals` package is being developed by the **Teal Enhancements for
Industry Adoption** PHUSE working group. For more information about this
initiative, visit:
<https://advance.hub.phuse.global/wiki/spaces/WEL/pages/30441473/Teal+Enhancements+for+Cross-Industry+Adoption>

## Contributing

We encourage the open source community to join this effort and
contribute to the development of uteals.

# Package index

- [`uteals`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/uteals-package.md)
  [`uteals-package`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/uteals-package.md)
  :

  Decorators and transformators for `teal` modules.

## Decorators

- [`ggplot_decorator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/ggplot_decorator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : ggplot Decorator
- [`patchwork_plot_decorator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/patchwork_plot_decorator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Patchwork Decorator

## Transformators

- [`merge_levels_transformator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/merge_levels_transformator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Combine levels of a variable into one level
- [`or_filtering_transformator()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/or_filtering_transformator.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Apply Logical AND/OR filter transformations

## Access Management

- [`extract_modules_to_yaml()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/extract_modules_to_yaml.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Extract Non-Parent Module Labels to YAML
- [`keep_by_label()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/keep_by_label.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Filter Teal Modules by Label
- [`remove_by_label()`](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/reference/remove_by_label.md)
  **\[experimental\]** : Remove Teal Modules by Label

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Module Access Management with
  rAccess](https://github.com/phuse-org/uteals/articles/module-access-management.md):
